title: President House seeks opinion of Law Ministry on date of election
content:
ISLAMABAD, Aug 24 (APP):The President House Thursday here sought opinion of Ministry of Law and Justice on the letter written by the Election Commission of Pakistan.
The President House asked for the opinion on the viewpoint of the Election Commission that only Election Commission had the authority to give a date for elections.
The opinion was sought after the Election Commission replied to a letter written by the President on Wednesday.
The President House addressed its letter to the Secretary Ministry of Law and Justice.
